content.content: Welcome to Connect Ranked - a competitive Connect 4 experience! Take on AI opponents, climb the ranked ladder, and compete in tournaments every 10 minutes.

items: Competitive ranked matchmaking with 23 unique ranks
Tournaments every 10 minutes with exclusive rewards
Seasonal progression with special titles and banners
In-game shop with rotating cosmetic items

content.content: Good luck on your journey to Connect Legend!

Season 3 is here! Based off your performance in season 2, you earned banner rewards, and new title rewards! Starting from this season on, each rank will have a title reward, where Grand Champion and Connect Legend will have special glow effects.

Below is the list of banner rewards youll recieve based off where you ended up in season 2. Note, you also get every banner below your rank, so if your Diamond for example, you get all the rewards from below diamond as well. Banners are sorted from lowest rank to highest (starting at Bronze)
We hope you'll stick around for season 3!
